com.facebook.buck.thrift

Interface ThriftLanguageSpecificEnhancer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FlavorConvertible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThriftCxxEnhancer, ThriftJavaEnhancer, ThriftPythonEnhancer

    public interface ThriftLanguageSpecificEnhancer
extends FlavorConvertible
    Interface used to implement thrift support for a language. ThriftLibraryDescription objects will use these for the various languages it supports.

    • Method Summary

      • createBuildRule

        BuildRule createBuildRule(TargetGraph targetGraph,
                          BuildRuleParams params,
                          BuildRuleResolver resolver,
                          ThriftConstructorArg args,
                          com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<String,ThriftSource> sources,
                          com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> deps)
                   throws NoSuchBuildTargetException
        Parameters:
        sources - objects representing the thrift sources that are being compiled for this language, and the ThriftCompiler rules that do the compiling.
        deps - the language specific dependencies.
        Returns:
        a BuildRule which performs the language specific build.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBuildTargetException

        Returns:
